title: Boosting oxygen evolution with electrodes composed of metal sulfides and hydrogen bonded organic frameworks
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4SE00541D, Paper
Hina Naz, Rai Nauman Ali, Waqar Ahmad Qureshi, Amjad Ali, Albert Akeno Nyaaba, Guo Xing Zhu
The development of effective and durable electrocatalysts for overall water splitting is needed to get clean and stable energy resources. The oxygen evolution reaction (OER) is a crucially constraining reaction...
